titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on ranitidine hydrochloride (bulk and dosage forms).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 10/13/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on n(2-(((5-((dimethylamino)methyl)-2-furanyl)methyl)thio)ethyl)-n-methyl-2 -nitro-1,1-ethenediamine, hydrochloride (ranitidine hydrochloride in bulk and dosage forms).
